ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor sighed with relief as Prowl seemed to back out of a particularly dangerous situation, she watched the auto-gun charges head for their target

 * Iron Raptor sighed with relief as Prowl seemed to back out of a particularly dangerous situation, she watched the auto-gun charges head for their target (Shocker.)
She had then looked back at Prowl and into those proud optics of his that she seemed to love so much, but it seemed that they had changed to her and become more soft as she continued to look into them. It was then that she had felt his hand push her towards him but she did not resist at the slightest, captivated by the wonder and depth of his eyes.
She was surprised to say the least when she had felt his lips press against and cover her own, it was something that she hadn't expectedï¿½so soon. She tensed and her optics widened for a moment at the sudden action but then relaxed in his arms, it was a new experience and one that was strange to her  but exciting. A slight shiver ran through her body but she thought it wise to ignore it, just a handle on the moment. She felt so safe in Prowl's arms as he held her close, at almost seemed...right.*
